query:
SELECT /* server.clients.find_one*/
                        c.vpn_id 
                      , v.vpn_name 
                      , t.terminal_id 
                      , t.terminal_name 
                      , t.owner_user_id 
                      , c.allowed_ip 
                      , c.public_key 
                      , c.created_at 
                      , c.approved_at IS NOT NULL AS is_approved
                   FROM clients c
             INNER JOIN vpns v
                     ON c.vpn_id = v.vpn_id
             INNER JOIN terminals t
                     ON c.terminal_id = t.terminal_id
                  WHERE 1 = 1
                    AND v.vpn_id      = $1
                    AND c.terminal_id = $2
                AND NOT c.is_deleted
                AND NOT t.is_deleted 
             ;
